verses.t: And the angel{H4397} that talked{H1696} with me came again{H7725}, and waked{H5782} me, as a man{H376} that is wakened{H5782} out of his sleep{H8142},

And said{H559} unto me, What seest{H7200} thou? And I said{H559}, I have looked{H7200}, and behold a candlestick{H4501} all of gold{H2091}, with a bowl{H1531} upon the top{H7218} of it, and his seven{H7651} lamps{H5216} thereon, and seven{H7651} pipes{H4166} to the seven{H7651} lamps{H5216}, which are upon the top{H7218} thereof:a bowl: Heb. her bowlseven pipes…: or, seven several pipes to the lamps
And two{H8147} olive trees{H2132} by it, one{H259} upon the right{H3225} side of the bowl{H1543}, and the other{H259} upon the left{H8040} side thereof.
So I answered{H6030} and spake{H559} to the angel{H4397} that talked{H1696} with me, saying{H559}, What are these, my lord{H113}?
Then the angel{H4397} that talked{H1696} with me answered{H6030} and said{H559} unto me, Knowest{H3045} thou not what these be? And I said{H559}, No, my lord{H113}.

Then he answered{H6030} and spake{H559} unto me, saying{H559}, This is the word{H1697} Lordof the {H3068} unto Zerubbabel{H2216}, saying{H559}, Not by might{H2428}, nor by power{H3581}, but by my spirit{H7307}, saith{H559} Lordthe {H3068} of hosts{H6635}.might: or, army

Who art thou, O great{H1419} mountain{H2022}? before{H6440} Zerubbabel{H2216} thou shalt become a plain{H4334}: and he shall bring forth{H3318} the headstone{H7222} thereof with shoutings{H8663}, crying, Grace{H2580}, grace{H2580} unto it.
Moreover the word{H1697} Lordof the {H3068} came unto me, saying{H559},

The hands{H3027} of Zerubbabel{H2216} have laid the foundation{H3245} of this house{H1004}; his hands{H3027} shall also finish{H1214} it; and thou shalt know{H3045} Lordthat the {H3068} of hosts{H6635} hath sent{H7971} me unto you.

For who hath despised{H936} the day{H3117} of small things{H6996}? for they shall rejoice{H8055}, and shall see{H7200} the plummet{H913} in the hand{H3027} of Zerubbabel{H2216} with those seven{H7651}; they are the eyes{H5869} Lordof the {H3068}, which run to and fro{H7751} through the whole earth{H776}.for they…: or, since the seven eyes of the Lord shall rejoiceplummet: Heb. stone of tin
Then answered{H6030} I, and said{H559} unto him, What are these two{H8147} olive trees{H2132} upon the right{H3225} side of the candlestick{H4501} and upon the left{H8040} side thereof?

And I answered{H6030} again{H8145}, and said{H559} unto him, What be these two{H8147} olive{H2132} branches{H7641} which through{H3027} the two{H8147} golden{H2091} pipes{H6804} empty{H7324} the golden{H2091} oil out of themselves?through: Heb. by the hand ofempty…: or, empty out of themselves oil into the goldthe golden oil: Heb. the gold
And he answered{H559} me and said{H559}, Knowest{H3045} thou not what these be? And I said{H559}, No, my lord{H113}.
Then said{H559} he, These are the two{H8147} anointed{H3323} ones{H1121}, that stand{H5975} by the Lord{H113} of the whole earth{H776}.anointed…: Heb. sons of oil
